snippet.title: LBC
snippet.description:
Welcome to LBC – the home of live debate on YouTube.

Whether you want the latest on current affairs, news or want to join in the conversation around UK politics and culture, or you simply want to be entertained by our outspoken hosts, LBC is the YouTube channel for you.

You can listen to LBC live as we stream our talk radio show daily to make sure we are bringing you the latest interviews, news and commentary so you will always be up to date on what is happening in the UK, Europe and beyond.

You can sit back and listen to the best current affairs shows in the world or phone in and talk with the likes of Rachel Johnson, Iain Dale, James O’Brien and Nick Ferrari, along with the big-name guests who are at the centre of the key stories of the day.

Whether it’s the Brexit debate or feminism, news and current affairs home and abroad, LBC is Leading Britain’s Conversation so make sure you are subscribed so you never miss a word of it.
